en.text01:
What’s your favorite Jizo dish?
Enjoy a selection of fresh, Handmade Authentic Japanese Noodle Bowls, crafted with care to bring you the best of Umami-filled flavors.
en.text02:
We offer a range of Udon and Ramen dishes, including favorites like Spicy Miso, Shoyu, Mazemen, Kimchi and other beloved classics. 
Stay updated on our latest menu specials, hours, and exclusive news by following us on social media.
en.text03: or stop by to enjoy our fresh offerings!

no.text02: We love exploring culinary variety and new flavors. If you want to know which homemade specialties we’ll be serving at our next PopUp, follow us on
no.text03: or stop by to enjoy our fresh offerings!
